item.title: Counterpoint数据显示，iPhone出货量激增28%后，苹果跃居中国市场首位
item.description: 据Counterpoint Research数据显示，尽管关键存储芯片短缺问题持续恶化，苹果公司凭借假日季度iPhone出货量28%的强劲增长，重新夺回中国市场头把交椅。【原文：Apple Inc. retook the top spot in China after iPhone shipments jumped 28% during the holiday quarter despite a worsening shortage of vital memory chips, according to Counterpoint Research.】

item.title: 中国出口为经济增长带来1997年以来最大助力
item.description: 中国依靠出口推动经济增长的程度，已达到近三十年前亚洲金融危机以来未曾有过的水平。这种实力展现使其得以挺过由唐纳德·特朗普挑起的贸易战。【原文：China relied on exports to drive economic growth to a degree unseen since the Asian financial crisis nearly three decades ago, in a demonstration of strength that allowed it to ride out the trade war started by Donald Trump.】

item.title: 欧元区将选出欧洲央行二把手，为更大规模的理事会改组铺路
item.description: 欧元区财长将于周一选出欧洲央行的下一任副行长，这一决定将为克里斯蒂娜·拉加德卸任后的行长职位继任铺平道路。【原文：Euro-area finance ministers are set to select the European Central Bank’s next vice president on Monday in a decision that will set the stage for the succession to Christine Lagarde in the top job.】

item.title: 裕信银行重返企业贷款领域，令波兰竞争对手心惊胆战
item.description: 裕信银行在重启业务仅数月后，便积极进军波兰企业债市场，引发利差收窄，令当地竞争对手保持警惕。【原文：UniCredit SpA is aggressively pushing into Poland’s corporate debt market just months after restarting operations, triggering a margin squeeze that has local competitors on alert.】

item.title: 新加坡交易所瞄准日本利率上调中的全球宏观基金
item.description: 新加坡交易所有限公司将推出长期日本政府债券期货合约，随着全球第三大债券市场的交易日益活跃。【原文：Singapore Exchange Ltd. will introduce futures on longer-dated Japanese government bonds as trading in the world’s third-biggest debt market heats up.】

item.title: 乌克兰因无人机项目受挫暂缓新订单
item.description: 据德国军方简报及知情人士透露，乌克兰已暂停向欧洲最具价值的防务科技初创企业赫尔辛公司追加攻击无人机订单，此前该公司的武器系统在实战前线测试中出现故障。【原文：Ukraine is holding off on additional orders for strike drones from Helsing, Europe’s most valuable defense tech startup, after the company’s weapon systems faced problems in front line tests in battle, according to a German military presentation and people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 杰里米·格兰瑟姆称人工智能确实是经典的市场泡沫
item.description:
GMO联合创始人阐释了为何多数投资"溢价"归根结底是价值问题——以及为何人工智能的承诺也无法避免其经历痛苦的洗牌。

【原文：

The GMO co-founder explains why most investing “premiums” boil down to value—and why AI’s promise doesn’t spare it from a painful shakeout.

】

item.title: 英国债券市场准备迎接180亿英镑零售投资热潮
item.description: 英国最优惠税收条款的债券表现优异，投资者正试图抢在预期中的散户交易热潮前布局。【原文：UK bonds with the most favorable tax terms are outperforming as investors look to get ahead of an expected rush from retail traders.】

item.title: 欧盟拟对930亿欧元美国商品加征关税，以应对特朗普新威胁
item.description: 欧盟正就可能对价值930亿欧元（1080亿美元）的美国商品加征关税进行磋商，前提是特朗普总统兑现其威胁——即在2月1日对欧洲国家征收10%的关税。【原文：The European Union is in talks to potentially impose tariffs on €93 billion ($108 billion) of US goods if President Donald Trump follows through on his threat to hit European countries with a 10% levy on Feb. 1.】

item.title: 杰里米·格兰瑟姆称人工智能确实是经典的市场泡沫
item.description: 四十多年来，杰里米·格兰瑟姆始终是全球投资领域最具逆向思维的代表人物之一。 这位波士顿资产管理公司GMO的联合创始人，凭借在泡沫破裂前发出预警而声名鹊起——从1980年代末的日本股市，到2000年的美国科技股，再到全球金融危机前夕的房地产市场。本周他做客《梅琳谈钱》播客节目，与主持人梅琳·萨默塞特·韦布探讨为何他认为当前存在人工智能泡沫，以及【原文：For more than four decades, Jeremy Grantham has been one of the most contrarian voices in global investing. The co-founder of Boston-based asset manager GMO, he built his reputation warning about bubbles before they burst, from Japanese equities in the late 1980s to US tech stocks in 2000 and housing in the run-up to the global financial crisis. He joins this week’s Merryn Talks Money podcast with host Merryn Somerset Webb to discuss why he believes there’s an artificial intelligence bubble and】

item.title: 空客人形机器人订单令中国机器人制造商股价飙升
item.description: 优必选科技股价大涨，这家中国人形机器人制造商获得空客公司订单后，其产品在全球制造业的应用前景得到提振。【原文：UBTech Robotics Corp. shares jumped after the China-based humanoid maker received an order from Airbus SE, bolstering the outlook for use of its products in global manufacturing.】

item.title: 美元因特朗普对欧洲的新关税威胁面临压力
item.description: 分析师指出，随着特朗普总统考虑对欧洲国家加征关税以换取收购格陵兰岛的计划，美元正面临新的逆风，这加剧了美国政策的不确定性。【原文：The dollar faces fresh headwinds as President Donald Trump weighs tariffs on European nations tied to his plan to acquire Greenland, raising uncertainties over US policies, according to analysts.】

item.title: 韩股跌至亚洲最差表现引发韩债需求
item.description: 韩国一家领先的信用卡公司正在当地市场发行美元债券，凸显出在韩元近期贬值后，投资者对分散韩元风险的需求。【原文：A leading South Korean credit card company is selling a dollar bond in the local market, highlighting demand to diversify away from the won after recent its declines.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚将维持利率不变，通胀率逼近10%：决策指南
item.description: 罗马尼亚决策者很可能维持欧盟最高利率之一，以抑制接近10%的通胀率。预计未来数月通胀增速将仅缓慢放缓。【原文：Romania’s policymakers will likely maintain one of the highest interest rates in the European Union to tame inflation that’s running near 10% and expected to slow only gradually in the coming months.】

item.title: 中国养猪企业牧元集团据悉正评估15亿美元香港上市意向
item.description: 知情人士透露，全球最大的养猪和猪肉生产商之一牧元食品公司已开始评估投资者对香港上市的兴趣，此次上市可能筹集高达15亿美元资金。【原文：Muyuan Foods Co., one of the world’s biggest pig breeders and pork producers, has started gauging investor interest for a Hong Kong listing that may raise as much as $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Sphere计划在华盛顿地区开设新场馆，此前其在拉斯维加斯的项目已取得成功
item.description: 拉斯维加斯球形剧场运营商计划在华盛顿都会区新建场馆，继其首座球形场馆成功运营后，将在美国增设第二处场地。【原文：The operator of Las Vegas’s Sphere is planning to build a new venue in the Washington metropolitan area, adding a second US location following a successful start for its original orb-like arena.】

item.title: 铜价逼近13000美元，美元因格陵兰关税走低
item.description: 随着美元因特朗普总统威胁对格陵兰岛加征关税而走弱，且中国经济增速达到政府目标，铜价再度上涨。【原文：Copper resumed gains as the dollar weakened on President Donald Trump’s threats to impose tariffs over Greenland, and China’s economic growth met the government target.】

item.title: 东京电力将推迟重启新潟核电站，NHK报道
item.description: 日本东京电力公司将推迟重启其位于新潟县的核电机组，日本广播协会（NHK）周一报道称，此前该机组周末发现警报系统存在问题。【原文：Japanese utility Tokyo Electric Power Co. will delay the restart of its nuclear power unit in Niigata, local broadcaster NHK reported on Monday, following an issue with an alarm that was discovered over the weekend.】

item.title: 美光称"史无前例"的内存短缺将持续至2026年之后
item.description: 英伟达供应商美光科技公司表示，持续的内存芯片短缺在过去一个季度加剧，并重申由于人工智能基础设施所需的高端半导体需求激增，供应紧张将持续到今年之后。【原文：Nvidia Corp. supplier Micron Technology Inc. said an ongoing memory chip shortage has accelerated over the past quarter and reiterated that the crunch will last beyond this year due to a surge in demand for high-end semiconductors required for AI infrastructure.】

item.title: 日本电力公司Erex正洽谈收购陷入困境的Enetrade
item.description: 据彭博社获得的文件显示，总部位于东京的电力与可再生能源企业Erex公司正就收购Enetrade公司进行深入磋商。Enetrade作为一家贸易商，正因一系列亏损交易的负面影响而陷入困境。【原文：Tokyo-based electricity and renewable energy firm Erex Co. is in advanced discussions to take over Enetrade Inc., a trader which is grappling with the fallout from unprofitable deals, according to a document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 中国ETF资金流出创纪录，表明国家队正在冷却市场涨势
item.description: 中国所谓"国家队"持有的交易所交易基金组合周五再现创纪录资金流出，进一步表明监管部门正出手遏制泡沫风险。【原文：A basket of exchange-traded funds owned by China’s so-called national team saw another day of record outflows on Friday, adding to signs that authorities are stepping in to curb the risk of a bubble.】

item.title: 铁矿石价格下跌，因中国钢铁产量下降，西芒德矿石船抵达码头
item.description: 铁矿石价格连续第五日下跌，创下自11月以来最长的跌势。北京方面证实钢铁产量大幅下滑，同时非洲一家大型新矿的首批货物已运抵中国。【原文：Iron ore sank for a fifth day, the longest losing run since November, as Beijing confirmed a big drop in steel production and the inaugural cargo from a major new mine in Africa arrived in China.】

item.title: 信实工业和印度工业信贷投资银行盈利不及预期，料将助长印度股市空头气焰
item.description: 银行股约占Nifty指数的30%，是任何盈利复苏的关键所在。【原文：Banks make up about 30% of the Nifty and are key to any earnings recovery.】

item.title: 菲律宾证券交易所申报网站遭遇间歇性中断
item.description: 菲律宾证券交易所公司披露网站正经历间歇性停机，但据该交易所运营商称，市场交易仍照常进行。【原文：The Philippine Stock Exchange Inc.’s website for company disclosures is experiencing intermittent downtime, though market trading continues as usual, according to the stock exchange operator.】

item.title: 中国铝产量创历史新高，钢铁产量低于10亿吨
item.description: 去年中国铝产量创历史新高，突破了全国产能上限，而钢铁产量则跌至七年低点，凸显出这两种最常用金属的前景截然不同。【原文：Chinese aluminum output rose to an all-time high last year, climbing above the country’s capacity limit, while steel fell to a seven-year low, underscoring dramatically different prospects for the two most widely used metals.】

item.title: 菲尔塔尔公司10亿美元出售计划据称因估值问题陷入停滞
item.description: 知情人士透露，由于股东与潜在买家对菲尔塔公司估值存在分歧，该公司出售事宜已陷入停滞。【原文：A sale of PhilTower has stalled because of differences in views between shareholders and potential buyers about the company’s valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国煤炭产量2025年创历史新高 尽管其消耗量减少
item.description: 尽管由于清洁电力供应激增，中国发电厂燃煤量有所减少，但去年中国煤炭产量仍创下历史新高，北京方面继续将能源安全置于优先地位。【原文：China’s coal production reached a record last year, even as the country’s power plants burned less of the fossil fuel due to a flood of cleaner electricity, with Beijing continuing to prioritize energy security.】

item.title: 威利斯称新西兰央行行长本应讨论对鲍威尔的支持
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉·威利斯表示，她更希望储备银行行长安娜·布雷曼在签署支持美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的声明前能与她沟通。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis said she would have preferred Reserve Bank Governor Anna Breman spoke with her before signing a statement in support of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 新加坡房地产股有望创十余年来最佳开局
item.description: 新加坡房地产股有望创下14年来最佳开局，投资者押注即将公布的财报将揭示慷慨的资本回报计划。【原文：Singapore’s real estate stocks are set for their best start in 14 years, buoyed by investor bets that upcoming earnings reports will unveil generous capital return plans.】

item.title: Point72在香港恒基兆业大厦扩充办公空间
item.description: Point72资产管理公司已签署协议，将在香港中环的摩天大楼The Henderson增租更多办公空间。随着金融业需求回升，这为饱受困扰的香港写字楼市场带来喘息之机。【原文：Point72 Asset Management has signed a deal to take more space for its upcoming office in The Henderson, a skyscraper in Hong Kong’s Central district, as demand from the financial sector provides relief to the city’s beleaguered office market.】
